name: One in the Chamber (Nyzxe, Xraee, Kaynn Cahya, SoulBounded, Jarrett Ang)
name_original: One in the Chamber (Nyzxe, Xraee, Kaynn Cahya, SoulBounded, Jarrett Ang)
description:
This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2019.

Survive with one bullet in the chamber!  Left-Click to shoot and aim with your mouse.  You regain your bullet when you hit an enemy.  Your gun upgrades as you kill enemies.  Enemies will attempt to push you off the arena. You die if you fall. 

Good luck. Full-screen play recommended.
